entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 4:31 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
